text: 2.5: Kis 19.6; Ais 61.6; Hos 14.2; Mal 1.11; Ro 12.1; Ef 2.21-22; Fi 4.18; Hi 13.15-16; VB 1.6Nde vhɨra zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki ŋkɨɨ ma. Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaara ŋkasŋkar panan, Fhe Bakɨme nden muuŋgirim, nde anan phen kɨrga. Nde maaŋ muuŋgirga, Fhe Bakɨme nden farasegɨrga, nde anan rotu gari gumgi kɨv, nde Zisas Krais zɨn panan, nde Fhe Bakɨme vuzvugi ofa farar muuŋgip, nde wari ndi Fhe Bakɨmen nɨɨŋgirim, ana nde vuzvugirga.
